trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/day)
trait.desc: Rauds can cast darkness (self only) without using any spell slots or material components. His spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Ritual Scarring
trait.desc: All cultists of Azrael have undergone extensive and painful rituals to strengthen their fortitude, granting them advantage on all constitution saving throws.

trait.name: Steady Hand
trait.desc: If the cultist targets themselves with their dagger, they only do 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Hellish Rebuke (1/day)
trait.desc: Target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Horn
action.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 25ft, one creature. Rauds can throw his horn at a target, dealing 1d6+3 necrotic damage. On hit, the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be enfeebled until they use an action to remove the horn, or Rauds recalls it.

action.name: Rapier
action.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one creature. 1d8+2 piercing damage.
